page.title: 08School pupil's day.
page.content: A typical weekday would involve rising at 7.30 am and getting ready for the bus which arrives at 8.20 am, I don't take breakfast as there is no time. Since the population of Upper Largo is not large one bus goes to all the stops at the surrounding villages. The pupils from my area either attend Buckhaven or Kirkland High. I go to Buckhaven as do around 20 others. The bus journey takes around half an hour covering about 6 or 7 miles.I arrive at school at around 8.45.The morning until break at 10.35 consists of going to classes such as French,Geography, Maths and English. After break I go to other classes till lunch at 12.55. I do not travel home for lunch as it is too far but visit my Gran who lives locally or have school lunches.
